titleStmt.title: The fabulous tales of Esope the Phrygian, compiled moste eloquently in Scottishe metre by Master Robert Henrison, & now lately Englished. ; Euery tale moralized most aptly to this present time, worthy to be read..
Aesop's fables. English. Selections. 1577
titleStmt.author: Aesop.
Henryson, Robert, 1430?-1506?
Smith, Richard, fl. 1587.

notesStmt.note: English translation attributed to Richard Smith by STC (2nd ed.).
